info.name: MClass Course Management System API
info.description:
Complete API collection for MClass - Laravel 11 課程管理系統

基本資訊:
- Base URL: http://localhost:8001
- Content-Type: application/json
- Accept: application/json

query.description: Optional: Schedule start date (default: start of current week)
Optional: Schedule end date (default: end of current week)
Required: Member ID to get notifications for
Optional: Number of notifications per page (1-100)
Required: Member ID to get statistics for

body.raw:
{
    "product_id": 1,
    "name": "學業規劃諮商服務",
    "code": "COUNSELING-ACADEMIC-001",
    "description": "協助學生解決學習困難，規劃學業發展方向",
    "details": "提供個人化的學業指導，包含選課建議、學習方法改善、時間管理、考試策略等",
    "feature_img": "counseling/academic-counseling.jpg",
    "counseling_mode": "both",
    "session_duration": 60,
    "total_sessions": 1,
    "allow_reschedule": true,
    "status": "active"
}

{
    "product_id": 1,
    "name": "學業規劃諮商服務 (更新)",
    "code": "COUNSELING-ACADEMIC-001",
    "description": "協助學生解決學習困難，規劃學業發展方向",
    "details": "提供個人化的學業指導，包含選課建議、學習方法改善、時間管理、考試策略等。已更新服務內容。",
    "feature_img": "counseling/academic-counseling.jpg",
    "counseling_mode": "both",
    "session_duration": 90,
    "total_sessions": 1,
    "allow_reschedule": true,
    "status": "active"
}

query.description: Optional: Filter by status (pending, confirmed, completed, cancelled)
